page.title: 15Planning our Questionnaire
page.content: We planned a questionnaire to find out what children at Brixington Junior School thought of living in this area.190 children out of 240 answered our questions. One third of children at our school have a father serving in the Royal Marines at Lympstone and these families move around the country a lot. We wanted to find out more about houses in our catchment area; also, what children really think of this part of Exmouth. There were 32 questions on the sheet. Here are the most important: 1)Where were you born? 2)Where were your Mother and Father born? 3)How long have you lived in Exmouth? 4)What type of house do you live in? 5)How many bedrooms has it ? 6)Which firm built it and when? 7)Have you got a car? 8)Which other facilities would you like to see in this area? The Results are on Page 16.
